channel.title: Donator item teleport help

item.title: Donator item teleport help
item.dc:creator: @Elegant Elegant
item.description:
@Elegant wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:551127”]You put the code in this packet:
https://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317:Item_action_1

However, it might need to go into this one:
https://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317:Alternate_item_option_2

It should be named ItemClick2.[/quote]

Oh okay, seeing your response I was able to put it all together and it made sense, ItemClick is for all items requiring one click. So I simply put the code in the wrong packet. Thank you so much.

Read full topic

item.title: Donator item teleport help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You put the code in this packet:
https://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317:Item_action_1

However, it might need to go into this one:
https://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317:Alternate_item_option_2

It should be named ItemClick2.

item.title: Donator item teleport help
item.dc:creator: @Elegant Elegant
item.description:
@Elegant wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:551127”]Where did you place this code?

All you have provided us with is a random snippet… We need more information. Please read the first link in my signature about posting a better help topic…

One possible issue is you could be clicking the second option for the item, and you have the code in the first click packet…[/quote]

Sorry mate, here is a screenshot of my screen - http://prntscr.com/6upanr
The code above the ectophial is for the dung. zone ring and it works perfect.
And i’m sorry I don’t understand what you mean .

Btw this isn’t for release, knowing it’s probably scaring you that i’m making a server. Just learning

Read full topic

item.title: Donator item teleport help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Where did you place this code?

All you have provided us with is a random snippet… We need more information. Please read the first link in my signature about posting a better help topic…

One possible issue is you could be clicking the second option for the item, and you have the code in the first click packet…

item.title: Donator item teleport help

item.description:
@Elegant wrote:

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/snippets/278711-pi-make-items-donator-only.html[/quote]

That post you provided was to make an item only wearable by a donator, please look further into the question before assuming. :palm:

item.title: Donator item teleport help
item.dc:creator: @Elegant Elegant
item.description:
@Elegant wrote:

I’m trying to make using an item donator only. It’s an ectophial that I want only donators only able to use
http://prntscr.com/6up0kl

What’s wrong with my code? No compile errors but it doesn’t work in-game -

if(itemId == 4251) { if (c.isDonator == 1) { c.getPA().spellTeleport(2524, 4777, 0); c.sendMessage("<img=0>You teleported to Donator Island.<img=0>"); } else { c.sendMessage("You must be an donator to teleport to the Donator Island!"); return; }

Read full topic
